scripts.ports: lsof -i -P -n 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $1, $9}' | sort -t: -k2 -n | uniq
scripts.ports:kill: lsof -ti:4573,:4617 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'Ports already free'
scripts.release: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add -A && git commit -m "v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy .svelte-kit/cloudflare --project-name=orchon
scripts.ship: npm run release && npm run deploy
